video.title: Touch
video.synopsis: Kiefer Sutherland stars as the father of an autistic boy who appears to be able to predict future events -- despite not being able to speak.

episodes.synopsis: Martin Bohm is unable to connect to his emotionally challenged son, Jake. But everything changes when Martin learns that Jake can predict the future.
episodes.title: Tales of the Red Thread

episodes.synopsis: When a robbery at a pawn shop triggers a sequence of unpredictable events, it's up to Jake and Martin to find the thread linking them all.
After coming into contact with a vagrant who has the same obsession with numbers as Jake, Martin undertakes a series of seemingly unrelated tasks.
episodes.title: Safety in Numbers

episodes.synopsis: Martin crosses paths with a man who has a history with his dead wife. A Iraqi teen is looking for an American soldier who has been forced into hiding.
episodes.title: Kite Strings

episodes.synopsis: Martin's laptop is stolen on the day Jake is scheduled for an evaluation. As a result, he becomes ensnared in a woman's quest to avenge her family.
episodes.title: Entanglement

episodes.synopsis: As Martin and Clea work to uncover a shocking development involving Clea's mentally-challenged mother, Teller steps into trouble when he visits Jake.
episodes.title: Lost & Found

episodes.synopsis: Martin tries to find Teller's workshop and winds up aiding another professor, Logan, to win big at poker. Martin's sister-in-law visits Clea and Jake.
episodes.title: Noosphere Rising

episodes.synopsis: Martin helps reunite a French woman with her biological mother and twin sister, then attempts to find the person responsible for their estrangement.
episodes.title: Zone of Exclusion

episodes.synopsis: Martin exposes a corrupt parole officer, and a Brazilian street musician uses his guitar to win the heart of a beautiful woman.
episodes.title: Music of the Spheres

episodes.synopsis: When Martin is mistaken for a criminal, he must involve himself with a heist crew in order to win back an innocent dock worker's job.
episodes.title: Tesselations

episodes.synopsis: As the Aster Corporation increases their interest in Jake, Martin joins forces with Abigail as the stakes of Jake's custody escalate.
episodes.title: Gyre: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: When Avram suggests that Jake and Amelia, a girl presumed dead with similar characteristics as Jake, are connected, Martin vows to uncover the truth.
episodes.title: Gyre: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: With Martin and Jake on the run, the setting shifts to Los Angeles, where they will cross paths with a mathematical genius and a religious zealot.
episodes.title: Road Not Taken

episodes.synopsis: Jake leads Martin to Los Angeles, where they team with Lucy Robbins to search for her daughter, who may be the key to understanding Jake's abilities.
episodes.title: Event Horizon

episodes.synopsis: Aster Corps genius Calvin Norburg is on the verge of a significant discovery. Meanwhile, religious zealot Guillermo Ortiz tries to realize his vision.
episodes.title: Closer

episodes.synopsis: Martin's mission to expose the potentially sinister Aster Corps has global consequences when a company employee crosses the border in Pakistan.
episodes.title: Enemy of My Enemy

episodes.synopsis: Unforeseen developments at Aster Corps force Martin to make a risky decision, and Lucy gives the police new information about Amelia's abduction.
episodes.title: Perfect Storm

episodes.synopsis: After Jake contacts Amelia with coordinates to a meeting place, they both escape, sending Martin and Lucy on a desperate search for their kids.
episodes.title: Eye to Eye

episodes.synopsis: After three years of searching for Amelia, Lucy's frustration and fury reach their peak. Meanwhile, Guillermo makes some life-changing decisions.
episodes.title: Broken

episodes.synopsis: On a stormy evening in Los Angeles, Jake's ability to communicate with Amelia proves to be critical in defending his life during a power outage.
episodes.title: Ghosts

episodes.synopsis: Martin, Lucy and Jake track down Calvin outside Tony Rigby's house, where Martin coerces Calvin into helping with the search for Amelia.
episodes.title: Reunions

episodes.synopsis: Martin tracks down Dr. Teller's first patient, who's scheduled to be executed in a matter of hours for murdering three Aster Corps employees.
episodes.title: Clockwork

episodes.synopsis: As Jake uses a cipher to locate Amelia, Martin follows a bloody path to Guillermo -- who's stalking a familiar member of the "Righteous 36."
episodes.title: Two of a Kind

episodes.synopsis: Martin rolls the dice with authorities when he tries to clear his name by spilling the beans to a dubious Det. Lange, who escalates the investigation.
episodes.title: Accused

episodes.synopsis: With Aster's quarterly report just days away, the pressure is on Calvin Norburg to deliver results from the company's study of the "Righteous 36."
episodes.title: Fight or Flight

episodes.synopsis: In the season finale, Aster Corps closes in on completing the number sequence that could catapult the company to the top of the global economy.
episodes.title: Leviathan
